Smart Window AC: Develop an air conditioner that can be installed in a window frame, allowing for easy installation and versatility in any room. This smart AC unit will be equipped with advanced features such as automatic temperature control, air purification, and a built-in fan for increased air circulation. It will also have a sleek and modern design that will complement any home decor.

Solar Powered AC: Create an air conditioner that runs on solar energy, providing a sustainable and eco-friendly cooling solution. This AC unit will use photovoltaic panels to convert sunlight into electricity, which will power the cooling system. This will not only reduce energy consumption but also lower electricity bills and carbon footprint.

Personalized AC: Develop an air conditioner that can be customized to meet individual cooling needs. This AC unit will use advanced sensors to monitor the temperature and humidity levels in the room and adjust the cooling settings accordingly. It will also have a built-in air purification system to remove allergens and pollutants from the air, providing a healthier and more comfortable environment.

Portable AC: Create a lightweight and compact air conditioner that can be easily moved from room to room or taken on the go. This portable AC unit will be powered by a rechargeable battery, allowing for up to 8 hours of continuous cooling. It will also have a built-in fan for increased air circulation and a sleek design that makes it easy to transport.

Air Purifying AC: Develop an air conditioner that not only cools the air but also purifies it. This AC unit will use advanced filters to remove dust, pollen, and other airborne pollutants, providing a healthier and more comfortable environment. It will also have a built-in humidifier to add moisture to the air, reducing the risk of dryness and discomfort.
